detail_desc: Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.5 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tab and button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knee-length jersey crêpe dress with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, detachable tie at the waist and a softly draping A-line skirt. Lined bodice.

Patterned set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and jersey-lined drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Braided belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with a metal chain hanging at one side and a metal buckle at the front. Width 1.7 cm.
Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed cotton jersey with long sleeves.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-stud at the top. Long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs, and an opening with ties at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Slippers with elastication around the opening, soft fabric linings and insoles and soft imitation leather soles.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
Cap in cotton jersey with a text motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a contrasting colour drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loose-fitting ankle-length trousers in a soft, woven cotton blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Chest pockets, patch front pockets and a seam at the waist with a concealed drawstring.
Padded lightweight gilet that can be worn under a jacket as an extra layer. V-neck, press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery appliqué and embroidered text on the front, a covered button on top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton sweatband.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Heel 6 cm.

Suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with an elasticated waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Round-necked dress in textured jersey containing glittery threads. Buttons at the back, cap sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Fitted, double-breasted, knee-length dress in woven fabric. Notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Thin shoulder pads for a more defined silhouette, long sleeves and a slit at the back of the hem. Lined.
Cropped sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Hard plastic smartphone case covered in leather on one side. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with appliqués on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard, and front pockets. Lined.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and round neckline with a ribbed trim.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Four metal pairs and one pair made of pearly plastic beads. Diameter from 3.5 cm to 7 cm.
Long-sleeved body in soft, patterned, ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle decorated with pearly plastic beads. Width 3.5 cm.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, high collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections, zipped front pockets and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with inset jersey panels down the sides. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with elastication at the back and lining in a cotton weave.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.
Joggers in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.

Soft, non-wired bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, classic front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short jumper in a soft cable knit with a slightly wider neckline and dropped shoulders.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with an embroidered appliqué at the front. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
Bikini briefs in patterned mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Suede sandals with cork midsoles and straps with hook and loop fastenings. Imitation suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline trimmed with a decorative, embroidered band and a V-shaped opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs, a gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and a skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fitted top in heavily draping ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves. Ribbed trims around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered, lined skirt.
Short dress in an airy weave with a V-neck with lacing at the front and a broderie anglaise front section. 3/4-length sleeves with trumpet cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Dungarees in stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a zipped chest pocket and real back pockets. Fake fly, a zip in one side and slim legs with a zip at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
